title: How to Add a Customised Background on Photo Booth (Mac)

steps.title: Download the image or video.
steps.content: Download the image or video. Gifs work too.

steps.title: Click the "Effects" button located at the bottom right corner of the Photo Booth.
steps.content: Click the "Effects" button located at the bottom right corner of the Photo Booth.

steps.title: Go to the last page in "Effects".
steps.content: Go to the last page in "Effects".

steps.title: Drag the background that you downloaded (or have) to any box marked "User Backdrop".
steps.content: Drag the background that you downloaded (or have) to any box marked "User Backdrop". The background will change to the image or video that is dragged. If it's a video it will play after you select the user backdrop.
